messages.message: Hey guys I'm trying to create an account on dogfood.instabase.com (http://dogfood.instabase.com) and it shows my email address has already been registered which I didn't. Also Paul helped me check my email address is not in the admin panel.  Can someone help me with this?
Can confirm, his instabase email is not in the list
so I actually see a user in the dogfood database with the email "<mailto:Daniel.gu@instabase.com|Daniel.gu@instabase.com>"...not sure why it doesn't come up in the dashboard
Yeah! we actually just found out that the emails are case-sensitive
Shows up if we use capitals
should we make login case insensitive? cc @Heymian
looks like its already in the core services backlog :slightly_smiling_face: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/CS-1318

yeah it’s in the backlog, it’s not the most straightforward of changes because our logins are usually gated with SSO for our customers and we currently respect whatever case sensitivity they want with their login providers. I believe we had one customer (Natwest?) change their case sensitivity and broke login for their users and we had to put in a workaround to walk their db and a special config to use lower case emails.
that being said i do want to change it and force lowercase everywhere (at least for new installs), but just isn’t super high priority don’t have the resources to do it right now
